statement.name: INSERT_SMAPBK
statement.sql: Insert into SMAPBK (NROPBK, CODCST, NROPRS, TPOPRS, TPOPBK, NOMPBK, EDTPBK, AGNPBK, SQLBKR) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

statement.name: UPDATE_SMAPBK
statement.sql: Update SMAPBK Set CODCST=?, NROPRS=?, TPOPRS=?, TPOPBK=?, NOMPBK=?, EDTPBK=?, AGNPBK=?, SQLBKR=? Where NROPBK=?
